comments.author: wcosta@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: [worker-manager](https://github.com/taskcluster/taskcluster/blob/master/services/worker-manager/README.md) supports the [additionalUserData](https://github.com/taskcluster/taskcluster/blob/master/services/worker-manager/src/providers/aws.js#L129) field which allow the worker configuration to provide custom user data to the worker. Unfortunally, `ci-admin` doesn't understand this field.
comments.text: [worker-manager](https://github.com/taskcluster/taskcluster/blob/master/services/worker-manager/README.md) supports the [additionalUserData](https://github.com/taskcluster/taskcluster/blob/master/services/worker-manager/src/providers/aws.js#L129) field which allow the worker configuration to provide custom user data to the worker. Unfortunally, `ci-admin` doesn't understand this field.
comments.creator: wcosta@mozilla.com

comments.text: As :tomprince pointed out, it turns out there [configuration exists](https://hg.mozilla.org/ci/ci-configuration/file/tip/worker-pools.yml#l1139).
